text:
Hello everyone, just coming to invite you guys to test the new HubSpot theme for VSCode: <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=NicolasMendes.enhanced-canvas-theme&ssr=false#overview>
I’ve remade the original Canvas theme from scratch to work with new VSCode versions, new syntax highlight and new features (including working better with HubL extension and Jinja templates). Let me know any possible improvements and general feedback about this theme, thank you all!

And this is a community made theme, and not an official HubSpot made thing, feel free to join us on <https://github.com/DreamDevourer/Enhanced-HubSpot-VScode-Theme|GitHub> for improving it even more and keeping it updated.

Just adding clarification that this is a community made theme, and not an official HubSpot made thing.

Very cool Nicolas
This is awesome! Vey Well done!
<@U7SL518D6> you are correct! I’ve uploaded it to the GitHub as well, everyone from HubSpot community can work with it.
